CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer PDTP-DT2BT exhibits the highest PCE of 3.12% , ascribed to the largest J SC = 11.43 mA cm^-2 with a slightly lower V OC of 0.54 V and a slightly higher FF of 0.57 than the other polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer PDTP-DT2BT exhibits the highest PCE of 3.12% , ascribed to the largest J SC = 11.43 mA cm^-2 with a slightly lower V OC of 0.54 V and a slightly higher FF of 0.57 than the other polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density) |
| V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| PDTP-DT2BT (Polymer) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density) |
| V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| PDTP-DT2BT (Polymer) |

Explanation:
The paragraph is about the properties of a specific polymer, so all mentioned entities refer to material properties. However, "exhibits the highest PCE" and "ascribed to" do not directly refer to material properties, but they are necessary to understand the context. Therefore, they are kept in the table for context, but they are not considered as separate entities.

| FF = 0.57 |

Note: "PDTP-DT2BT" is considered as a material identifier and not a property value. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
